summary: REQ-8/9/10/11 appear implemented: a new Admin page is added, reachable via header navigation, uses React Query hooks to load bookings with loading/empty/error states, supports delete with query invalidation, and sorts bookings newest-first on the page. One notable unrequested addition is a backend migration module/file, which also appears to violate the stated constraint to keep Motoko logic in backend/main.mo only.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a backend migration module/file and hooked it into the canister actor, despite the constraint to keep Motoko logic in a single actor file (backend/main.mo) and not add additional backend services/modules.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constraints specify keeping all Motoko logic in backend/main.mo; the diff adds backend/migration.mo and imports/uses it in backend/main.mo.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin UI includes additional fields/icons (e.g., Email column and related UI elements) beyond the minimum required fields.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-8 specifies at minimum: id, name, phone, event type, preferred date, submitted timestamp; the Admin page headings include Email and imports Mail-related iconography.
